DOC.detailed_description: Current era implantable cardioverter defibrillator ( ICDs ) high defibrillation efficacy . This stimulated debate whether DFT test perform all.1-3 However , dialog primarily center around left sided implant , group characterize small incidence high defibrillation threshold ( DFTs ) . The mechanism phase duration program improve DFTs would seem effectively apply group patient high incidence high DFTs right side implant . This study therefore aim prospectively evaluate direct phase duration program DFTs right side implant .
